nodes.text: Dovecote was the name of the mansion that was inhabited by Kaiya Adrimetrum, her husband, and their daughters. It was located on the edge of Koved City on Siluria III. Following the death of her husband at the hands of the Imperial occupation force, Adrimetrum formed a resistance cell using friends and family. Dovecote was used as their primary base, and it was their fallback point following the successful assault on Imperial Governor Quannith's mansion. Corwin Shelvay convinced Adrimetrum to join the Rebel Alliance in the mansion in the aftermath of the attack.
